text: Learning Gallery at Level 1 is a spacious and cozy venue designed to inspire curiosity and wonder, inspired by the theme of childhood. The Cloud Library has a thoughtfully curated collection of books. Do spend some time reading them. One of the standout exhibits for me is Everyday Practices on Level 3, which offers a poignant exploration of the lives of individuals who have faced significant hardships. It’s an immersive and thoughtful experience that makes the visit worthwhile. Plan to spend at least 2 hours at SAM to fully appreciate everything on offer. Definitely worth a visit!

Came for the Singapore Art Week event to check it out. It was quite loud, almost like a rave with most merchants having to scream to get their communication across. Also went into the exhibition inside the building and it was quite normal. I love the scenery behind the building with the giant machinery and tons of containers
Worth going many other Art Museum at all levels 12345 ,not near MRT station,only buses to reach there
Abstract artwork display, abeit placed beside an industrial building
Nice. If you want to spend your holidays or free time exploring something new, try visiting this place.
